sec.title: Transport instructions
sec.p: The transport instructions shall at least contain:

list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: information regarding means for towing and the procedure of towing the mobile rig in the event of a breakdown;

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: information of tying down points and the procedure of securing the rig during transportation;

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: information of lifting points and the procedure of lifting the rig.
